name: @instructure/cz-lerna-changelog
description: Prompts for conventional changelog standard in a lerna environment.
author: Instructure, Inc. Engineering and Product Design

//dependency-comments.cz-cli: This module cannot be ESM because cz-cli can only import CommonJS, see https://github.com/commitizen/cz-cli/issues/916
//dependency-comments.chalk: Chalk 5 is ESM. To use it this repo needs to be converted to ESM
//dependency-comments.inquirer: inquirer 9 is ESM. To use it this repo needs to be converted to ESM
